Group Introduction
EOS New York, the main manufacturer in North America. We are a self-funded team which consists of experienced professionals and are separated with outside interests. The only target of us is the success of EOS network.

团队介绍
EOS New York，北美的主要制造商。我们是一个由经验丰富的专业人士组成的自费团队，完全与所有外部利益分离。我们的唯一目标是确保EOS网络的成功。
